front.title: IEEE Draft Guide for Paralleling Regulating Transformers

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This paralleling guide describes and compares control methods of paralleling regulating transformers. The control methods include: master/follower, circulating current, power factor, circulating reactive current and negative reactant methods. This guide presents operating philosophy descriptions, sample wiring diagrams, typical operational variations, the provision of adequate backup protection and typical misapplication consequences. This guide does not apply to phase shifting regulating transformers.
